TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IpcServerChannel extends System.Object implements class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannel, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelReceiver, class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ISecurableChannel
Public Class IpcServerChannel Implements IChannelReceiver, ISecurableChannel
type IpcServerChannel = class interface IChannelReceiver interface IChannel interface ISecurableChannel

summary.span: 为远程调用实现使用 IPC 系统传输消息的服务器信道。

span.span: Implements a server channel for remote calls that uses the IPC system to transmit messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-class-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-class-note.md)] 通道由 .NET Framework 远程处理基础结构用于传输远程调用。Channels are used by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls. 当客户端调用远程对象时, 调用将被序列化为客户端通道发送并由服务器通道接收的消息。When a client calls a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel. 收到消息后, 将对其进行反序列化和处理。After the message is received, it is deserialized and processed. 任何返回值由服务器通道传输并由客户端通道接收。Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel. 类使用 Windows 进程间通信 (IPC) 系统在同一台计算机上的应用程序域之间传输消息。The class uses the Windows interprocess communication (IPC) system to transport messages between application domains on the same computer. 在同一台计算机上的应用程序域之间通信时, IPC 信道比 TCP 或 HTTP 通道快得多。When communicating between application domains on the same computer, the IPC channel is much faster than the TCP or HTTP channels. 若要在服务器端执行额外的消息处理, 请指定一个接口的实现, 通过该接口, 通过该接口来传递该实例处理的所有消息。To perform additional processing of messages on the server side, specify an implementation of the interface through which all messages processed by the instance are passed. 实例接受以二进制或 SOAP 格式序列化的消息。The instance accepts messages serialized in either binary or SOAP format. 对象具有关联的配置属性, 这些属性可在运行时在配置文件中设置 (通过调用静态方法) 或以编程方式 (通过将集合传递到构造函数)。A object has associated configuration properties that can be set at run time either in a configuration file (by invoking the static method) or programmatically (by passing an collection to the constructor). 有关这些配置属性的列表, 请参阅构造函数的文档。For a list of these configuration properties, see the documentation for the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 在`exclusiveAddressUse` 参数`properties`中将属性`false`设置为时, 可以为同一个命名管道注册多个对象。When setting the `exclusiveAddressUse` property to `false` in the `properties` argument, several objects can be registered for the same named pipe. 在这种情况下, 请求可以到达注册的任何通道。In such a case requests can go to any of the channels registered. 仅当同时使用 ALCs 时, 才会将此设置视为安全设置。This setting is considered secure only if ALCs are also used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类。The following code example illustrates how to use the class. [!code-cpp[Remoting_Ipc#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Ipc/CPP/server.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_Ipc#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Ipc/CS/server.cs#10)] 前面的代码用于公开以下远程对象。The preceding code is used to expose the following remote object. [!code-cpp[Remoting_Ipc#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Ipc/CPP/counter.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_Ipc#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Ipc/CS/counter.cs#0)] 有关远程使用此对象的客户端的示例, 请参阅。For an example of a client using this object remotely, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关通道配置属性的详细信息, 请参阅[通道和格式化程序配置属性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100))。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100)). 如果不需要接收器功能, 请将`sinkProvider`参数设置为。 `null`If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`. > [!CAUTION] > 在`exclusiveAddressUse` 参数`properties`中将属性`false`设置为时, 可以为同一个命名管道注册多个对象。When setting the `exclusiveAddressUse` property to `false` in the `properties` argument, several objects can be registered for the same named pipe. 在这种情况下, 请求可以到达注册的任何通道。In such a case requests can go to any of the channels registered. 仅当同时使用 ALCs 时, 才会将此设置视为安全设置。This setting is considered secure only if ALCs are also used. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel#41](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel/CPP/server2.cpp#41)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel#41](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel/CS/server2.cs#41)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数`name`使用参数设置属性。This constructor sets the property by using the `name` parameter. 如果要注册多个通道, 则每个通道都必须具有唯一的名称。If you want to register more than one channel, each channel must have a unique name. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数。The following code example shows how to use this constructor. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关通道配置属性的详细信息, 请参阅[通道和格式化程序配置属性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100))。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100)). 如果不需要接收器功能, 请将`sinkProvider`参数设置为。 `null`If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`. 如果不需要安全描述符, 请将`securityDescriptor`参数设置为。 `null`If you do not require a security descriptor, set the `securityDescriptor` parameter to `null`. > [!CAUTION] > 在`exclusiveAddressUse` 参数`properties`中将属性`false`设置为时, 可以为同一个命名管道注册多个对象。When setting the `exclusiveAddressUse` property to `false` in the `properties` argument, several objects can be registered for the same named pipe. 在这种情况下, 请求可以到达注册的任何通道。In such a case requests can go to any of the channels registered. 仅当同时使用 ALCs 时, 才会将此设置视为安全设置。This setting is considered secure only if ALCs are also used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虽然作为类的实例返回, 但可以将此属性的值强制转换为说明对象所侦听的通道的实例。Although returned as an instance of the class, the value of this property can be cast to an instance of that describes the channel to which the object listens. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel/CPP/server.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel/CS/server.cs#15)]

span.span: Gets the name of the current channel.

value.span: 包含信道名称的 实例。

span.span: A instance that contains the name of the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个已注册的通道都具有唯一的名称。Every registered channel has a unique name. 此名称用于在调用方法时检索特定通道。The name is used to retrieve a specific channel when calling the method. 默认名称为 "ipc 服务器"。The default name is "ipc server". ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel#12](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel/CPP/server.cpp#12)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel/CS/server.cs#12)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ChannelPriority As Integer
public: property int ChannelPriority { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取当前信道的优先级。

span.span: Gets the priority of the current channel.

value.span: 一个整数，指示分配给此信道的优先级。

span.span: An integer that indicates the priority assigned to the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 优先级控制通道数据在实例中的显示顺序; 较高优先级的通道显示在低优先级通道之前。The priority controls the order in which channel data appears in a instance; higher priority channels appear before lower priority channels. 客户端会按照实例中列出的顺序尝试连接到服务器通道。Clients try to connect to the server channels in the order that they are listed in the instance. 默认优先级为 20;允许负的优先级。The default priority is 20; negative priorities are allowed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel#13](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel/CPP/server.cpp#13)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Ipc.IpcServerChannel/CS/server.cs#13)]

param.name: data
param.span: 指定初始化状态的对象，如果不想将特定状态传递到信道，则为 。

span.span: An object that specifies an initialization state, or , if you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel.

summary.span: 指示当前信道开始侦听请求。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to start listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无需调用此方法即可开始在新初始化的通道上进行侦听。It is not necessary to call this method to begin listening on a newly initialized channel. 使用此方法可以在调用方法停止侦听通道之后, 重新启动在通道上进行侦听。Use this method to restart listening on a channel after the method has been called to stop listening on the channel. 数据对象可用于向通道传递特定的初始化状态。The data object can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel. 如果你不希望将特定状态传递到通道, 请将`null` `data`作为参数值传递。If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, pass `null` as the `data` parameter value.

exception.span: 指定的侦听端口不可用。

span.span: The specified listening port is not available.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void StopListening(object data) cil managed

param.name: data
param.span: 指定初始化状态的对象，如果不想将特定状态传递到信道，则为 。

span.span: An object that specifies an initialization state, or , if you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel.

summary.span: 指示当前信道停止侦听请求。

span.span: Instructs the current channel to stop listening for requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法停止在通道上进行侦听。Use this method to stop listening on a channel. 若要重新启动侦听, 请使用方法。To restart listening, use the method. 数据对象可用于向通道传递特定的初始化状态。The data object can be used to pass a specific initialization state to the channel. 如果你不希望将特定状态传递到通道, 请将`null` `data`作为参数值传递。If you do not want to pass a specific state to the channel, pass `null` as the `data` parameter value.
